frontmatter.title: Indexing DynamoDB Items to ElasticSearch using AWS Lambda
frontmatter.description: DynamoDB is Amazon’s NoSQL database which offers single-digit milliseconds latency. It is great for variety of use cases, but when you need to run complex search queries on your dataset, you quickly realise it is not designed for it.

frontmatter.title: Going Serverless Offline
frontmatter.description: In this post, we are going to setup an environment with API Gateway, Lambda and DynamoDB using serverless framework which can be deployed to AWS directly or run fully local.
